text: The Russia national football team is the national football team of Russia. == Most appearances == Rank Name Period Caps Goals Total career 1 Sergei Ignashevich 2002–2018 127 8 1999–2018 2 Oleg Blokhin 1972–1988 112 42 1969–1990 3 Igor Akinfeev 2004–2018 111 0 2003–present 4 Viktor Onopko 1992–2004 109 7 1986–2005 5 Vasili Berezutskiy 2003–2016 101 5 2000–2018 6 Rinat Dasayev 1979–1990 91 0 1976–1991 Aleksandr Kerzhakov 2002–2016 91 30 2001–2017 8 Albert Shesternev 1961–1971 90 0 1959–1972 9 Yuri Zhirkov 2005–present 87 2 2001–present 10 Anatoliy Demyanenko 1981–1990 80 6 1978–1993 == Top scorers == Rank Name Period Goals Caps Average 1 Oleg Blokhin 1972–1988 42 112 0.375 2 Aleksandr Kerzhakov 2002–2016 30 91 0.330 3 Oleg Protasov 1984–1991 29 68 0.426 4 Valentin Ivanov 1955–1965 26 59 0.441 Vladimir Beschastnykh 1992–2003 26 71 0.366 6 Eduard Streltsov 1955–1968 25 38 0.658 7 Viktor Kolotov 1970–1978 22 55 0.400 8 Roman Pavlyuchenko 2003–2012 21 51 0.412 9 Viktor Ponedelnik 1960–1966 20 29 0.690 Anatoliy Banishevskiy 1965–1972 20 50 0.400 Igor Chislenko 1959–1968 20 53 0.377 == Competitive record == === FIFA World Cup === * Fourth Place : 1 (1966) * Quarter-finals : 1 (2018) === UEFA European Championship === * Champions : 1 (1960) * Runners- Up : 3 (1964, 1972, 1988) * Semi-finals : 1 (2008) * Fourth Place: 1 (1968) ==References== Notes == Other websites == * Official website * Russia National Team * Russia National Team Category:European national football teams Category:Football in Russia
